content.raw:
[First bad result](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/drcsim-drcsim_2.6-gazebo-log_debug-arenas-precise-amd64-gpu-sl-vrc/4/console) using this branch. Please, review the console so we can assure it was using this branch.

This was a job still in development, which run drcsim test suite and vrc_arenas on top. This run failed for the lack of ssh inside pbuiler so unfortunately we don't have the trace.

Failing test: *vrc_task_1_scoring.test*

I will keep trying get a new trace.
